TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit DependencyPropertyChangedEventArgs extends System.ValueType

summary.span: 提供各种属性更改事件的数据。

span.span: Provides data for various property changed events.

summary.span: 通常这些事件对只读依赖属性的值中的有效值更改进行报告。

span.span: Typically these events report effective value changes in the value of a read-only dependency property.

summary.span: 另一种用法是作为 实现的一部分。

span.span: Another usage is as part of a implementation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用事件数据的类的事件和处理程序的方法实现通常遵循命名模式`Is*Changed`, 并且通常作为[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]事件实现, 而不会支持 (它们不是路由事件)。The events that use the class for event data, and the method implementations for handlers, generally follow the naming pattern `Is*Changed`, and are generally implemented as [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] events without backing (they are not routed events). 某些类处理方法, 这些方法 "处理" 其他不公开的事件 (这些事件通过属性更改报告状态更改, 如) 也将类用于事件数据。Some class handling methods that "handle" otherwise unexposed events that report a state change through a property change, such as , also use the class for event data. 的方案是使用自变量报告属性系统计算属性中的旧值和新值。The scenario for is to use the arguments to report old and new values that come from the property system evaluation of the property. 处理旧值和新值的回调可能会根据这些值选择特殊处理, 例如选择不响应被视为不重要的值更改。A callback that processes old and new values might choose special handling depending on these values, such as choosing to not respond to value changes that are deemed insignificant. ## Examples 下面的示例在的上下文中对也定义事件的自定义类的特定属性使用类。The following example uses the class in the context of a for a particular property of a custom class that also defines events. 回调从属性系统中获取旧值和新值的结果, 并将这些值重新打包到不同的事件参数类中。The callback takes the results of old and new values from the property system as communicated by , and repackages these into a different events arguments class . 然后, 新参数将用作定义的 "ValueChanged" 事件的数据, 并由自定义类引发。The new arguments are then used as the data for a "ValueChanged" event defined by and raised by the custom class. [!code-csharp[CustomControlNumericUpDownOneProject#DependencyPropertyChangedEventArgs](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CustomControlNumericUpDownOneProject/CSharp/NumericUpDown.cs#dependencypropertychangedeventargs)] [!code-vb[CustomControlNumericUpDownOneProject#DependencyPropertyChangedEventArgs](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CustomControlNumericUpDownOneProject/visualbasic/numericupdown.vb#dependencypropertychangedeventargs)]

span.span: The identifier for the dependency property that changed.

param.name: oldValue

param.name: newValue
param.span: 相关事件报告更改或状态更改之后的属性的值。

span.span: The value of the property after the change reported by the relevant event or state change.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 报告依赖属性更改的自定义事件的实现程序应使用此构造函数, 以便在引发事件时, 使用更改的细节填充事件数据。Implementers of custom events that report dependency property changes should use this constructor for populating the event data with the specifics of the change when the event is raised.

summary.span: 返回提供的对象是否与当前 相同。

span.span: Returns whether the provided object is equivalent to the current .

summary.span: 获取发生更改之后的属性的值。

span.span: Gets the value of the property after the change.

value.span: 发生更改之后的属性值。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 提供的值的类型应始终与所报告的依赖属性的类型可转换。The type of the value provided should always be castable to the type of the dependency property being reported. ## Examples 下面的示例在的上下文中对也定义事件的自定义类的特定属性使用类。The following example uses the class in the context of a for a particular property of a custom class that also defines events. 回调从属性系统中获取旧值和新值的结果, 并将这些值重新打包到不同的事件参数类中。The callback takes the results of old and new values from the property system as communicated by , and repackages these into a different events arguments class . 然后, 新参数将用作定义的 "ValueChanged" 事件的数据, 并由自定义类引发。The new arguments are then used as the data for a "ValueChanged" event defined by and raised by the custom class. [!code-csharp[CustomControlNumericUpDownOneProject#DependencyPropertyChangedEventArgs](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CustomControlNumericUpDownOneProject/CSharp/NumericUpDown.cs#dependencypropertychangedeventargs)] [!code-vb[CustomControlNumericUpDownOneProject#DependencyPropertyChangedEventArgs](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CustomControlNumericUpDownOneProject/visualbasic/numericupdown.vb#dependencypropertychangedeventargs)]

summary.span: 获取发生值更改的依赖项属性的标识符。

span.span: Gets the identifier for the dependency property where the value change occurred.

value.span: 发生值更改的依赖项属性的标识符字段。

span.span: The identifier field of the dependency property where the value change occurred.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果在为多个属性注册的公共中使用此属性, 则此属性是相关的, 需要消除调用回调的属性更改的歧义。This property is relevant if used within a common that is registered for several properties, and it is necessary to disambiguate which property change invoked the callback. 通常不与引发事件相关, 因为在属性与报告属性更改的事件之间通常存在1:1 的对应关系。 is not typically relevant for raising events, because there is usually a 1:1 correspondence between properties and events that report the property change. 引发的事件本身就是指示哪个属性发生了更改。The event that was raised is itself the indication of which property changed.
